title: Khyber Pakhtunkhwa cricketer fined during National U19 One-Day tournament
text:
Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (KP)’s U19 player, Abdullah, has been fined for showing dissent at umpire’s decision during the match against Southern Punjab in National U19 One Day Cup.

Abdullah’s 20 percent match fees will be deducted after he accepted the charges made on him by on-field umpires Kamran Khalil and Mohammad Basit.

The charges on him are according to clause 2.8 of the PCB Code of Conduct for Players and Player Support Personnel.

It is pertinent to mention here that PCB keeps strict policies regarding players’ behavior on the field.
